description: This is a portefolio for a graphic designer. I used Next.js 14, Xata for the database and Cloudinary for images hosting. The user can log-in, add a new project, delete a project and edit a project's infos.

Creating a React web app with Redux for user authentication. Basic features include: home, login, logout, and profile management. API routes are set up, and the integration is focused on Green Code principles with image optimization.

Development of a React app based on Figma mockups, including Collapse animations and responsiveness. Constraints include managing photo scrolling in the gallery, hiding buttons if there's only one image, maintaining a constant gallery height, and initializing Collapses in a closed state.
